                                            HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Integer>> tokenPathsOfDoc,
                                            gate.AnnotationSet syntaxTreeNodeAnnotationSet)
method name: generatePathsForToken() function: this is a helper method which when given a token annotation will find all the constituents (paths to) in the parse tree from the given token and will consequently add each one to an array list and return it.

annotateVerbsNotMarked

protected static void annotateVerbsNotMarked(gate.AnnotationSet tokenAnnotationSetOfSentence,
                                             gate.AnnotationSet triggerWordsAnnotationSet,
                                             gate.AnnotationSet outputScopeAnnotations,
                                             gate.AnnotationSet syntaxTreeNodeAnnotationSet,
                                             ArrayList<gate.Annotation> notAnnotationsAlreadyAnnotated,
                                             String outputAnnotationType,
                                             gate.AnnotationSet depRelationsSetOfSentence,
                                             boolean includeSubjectConstituent,
                                             HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Integer>> tokenPathsOfDoc)
method name: annotateVerbsNotMarked() this method is called for any implicit negation triggers that are verbs which have not been previously caught by one of the stated dependency cases. function: this is a method which handles the preparation of the scope parameters for implicit negation triggers that are verbs. This method will then call the relevent method to annotate the scope.

annotateImpTriggersNotMarked

protected static void annotateImpTriggersNotMarked(gate.AnnotationSet tokenAnnotationSetOfSentence,
                                                   gate.AnnotationSet triggerWordsAnnotationSet,
                                                   gate.AnnotationSet outputScopeAnnotations,
                                                   gate.AnnotationSet syntaxTreeNodeAnnotationSet,
                                                   ArrayList<gate.Annotation> notAnnotationsAlreadyAnnotated,
                                                   String outputAnnotationType,
                                                   gate.AnnotationSet depRelationsSetOfSentence,
                                                   boolean includeSubjectConstituent,
                                                   HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Integer>> tokenPathsOfDoc)
method name: annotateImpTriggersNotMarked() - new June 2013 this method is called for any implicit negation triggers which have not been previously caught by one of the stated dependency cases. check if they have an nsubj relation .... function: this is a method which handles the preparation of the scope parameters for implicit negation triggers that whose scope is the nsubj. This method will then call the relevent method to annotate the scope.

                                             String outputAnnotationType)
method name: markNonDependencyCases() this method is called from the first condition clause in the execute() in the ExtractScopeNegator class. function: this method is called in the case(s) where the scope to be determined does not rely on dependency relations & is determined to not have the conventional scope.
